function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Medium contact intensity in grocery stores and restaurants","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, enforce social distancing measures, and promote contactless delivery options","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering systems, and delivery tracking technologies","People":"Employees, customers, and vulnerable sections of society","Owner":"Management, health authorities, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Online communities and services in gymnasiums","Impact":"Potential uncertainty and lack of social interaction","Mitigation":"Offer diverse and engaging online services, foster social bonds and trust, and promote positive word of mouth effects","Technologies":"Video streaming platforms, community engagement tools, and social media platforms","People":"Service providers and customers","Owner":"Gymnasium management and marketing teams"}]}
